attributes.action: Football clubs will close without our fans , please get them back
attributes.additional_details:
We all can't help this year, but I hope there is some light at the end of all this, letting the fans I will help with a lot of struggles in life.
Staff losing their jobs , in fear of becoming homeless.
No fans, no small clubs, more homeless broken families , unfortunately more suicide rates !
attributes.background: Please get the fans back into the grounds , we need this to help not only to save jobs which are now being lost, but to help people who suffer from mental health , it's people's way of enjoyment

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552036
